name: google-audio-splitter
description: Audio splitting service using Google Cloud Functions with FFmpeg

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy splitAudio --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --memory 2GB --timeout 540s --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1
scripts.deploy-health: gcloud functions deploy health --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --memory 256MB --timeout 60s --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1

author: Aviz
